com.jde.model.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.model.entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Boss, Bullet, Enemy

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    This Entity class represents a moving, animated and able to collide object
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)
